title: Pluralistic Homophily in Networks: Code and Reproducible Pipeline

creators.name: Barraza, Fernando
creators.affiliation: Universidad Javeriana de Cali; Universidad de San Buenaventura Cali

creators.name: Fernández, Alejandro
creators.affiliation: LIFIA, Facultad de Informática, UNLP; CIC Buenos Aires

description: Reproducible code for neighborhood-centered pluralistic homophily (tilde h_v), normalized inter-community weight curves, and sensitivity curves with GCC. Includes validation, dataset descriptives, supplemental homophily (edge/community), and LFR helpers.
